subject: Re: Perform something before and after a complete test
msgSnippet: haefeleuser Tue, 19 Oct 2004 07:50:56 -0000 (rearranged) ... http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#organize_3 WFM, running JUnit plugin tests (neé
messageBody:
haefeleuser Tue, 19 Oct 2004 07:50:56 -0000 (rearranged)
> I want to perform something before the tests start. After all tests
> of a class have finished I want to perform another thing.

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#organize_3

WFM, running JUnit plugin tests (neé pde.junit) from Eclipse.

> Here is the bug report which I posted at the Eclipse site. Its bug
> 76232. Since I didn't receive any answer there, I post it here.

Try posting to the Hyades/TPTP newsgroup (look under
news.eclipse.org). They're gearing up improve support of JUnit and
extensions, and to allow finer-grained control of test running than
JUnit provides. (Which is probably a better idea than stuffing a new
layer of test-running control into JUnit, YMMV.)

HTH, Tom Roche, IBM Rational Developer Model2 Tooling
